description: Snapshot. Collection of all the latest measurements (timestamped) captured by the SCADA for all of its data channels.

SnapshotTimeUnixMs.description: The time at which the snapshot was put together.

LatestReadingList.description: The most up-to-date values the SCADA has for all channels, with timestamps of when they were last updated.

UUID4Str.description: A string of hex words separated by hyphens of length 8-4-4-4-12.

LeftRightDot.description: Lowercase alphanumeric words separated by periods, with the most significant word (on the left) starting with an alphabet character.

UTCMilliseconds.description: An integer reflecting unix time in MILLISECONDS between midnight Jan 1 2000 and midnight Jan 1 3000 UTC
